docs.text: Rewards Sharing Simulation Engine - Documentation This is the documentation for the Pooling Analysis tool developed by the University of Edinburgh's Blockchain Technology Lab. The relevant source code is available on Github . Overview Contributing

docs.text: This is the documentation for the Pooling Analysis tool developed by the University of Edinburgh's Blockchain Technology Lab. The relevant source code is available on Github .
docs.title: Rewards Sharing Simulation Engine - Documentation

docs.text: Metrics The metrics that we currently track are the following. Note that more metrics may be added in the future. Nakamoto coefficient : the minimum number of entities that collectively produce more than 50% of the system's total blocks. Gini coefficient : Shannon entropy :
